categories: Category:Star Wars: Republic Commando voice actors

nodes.text: Clint Young was a senior artist for LucasArts and Lucasfilm, and worked as the lead for several projects.

He has also been credited as a writer on several LucasArts titles including Star Wars Episode I: Racer (where the character Cy Yunga was named after him) and Star Wars: Bounty Hunter. Clint was also credited with making some of the 3D models in Star Wars: Jedi Knight: Dark Forces II. Young was also a voice actor for B1-Series battle droids and super battle droids in Star Wars: Republic Commando. He has several conceptual sites including blog sites where his art work is displayed, most recent as a senior lead concept artist on the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
